org.apache.storm.container.cgroup

Class CgroupManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.container.cgroup.CgroupManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceIsolationInterface

    public class CgroupManager
extends Object
implements ResourceIsolationInterface

    Class that implements ResourceIsolationInterface that manages cgroups.

      • reserveResourcesForWorker

        public void reserveResourcesForWorker(String workerId,
                                      Integer totalMem,
                                      Integer cpuNum)
                               throws SecurityException
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        This function should be used prior to starting the worker to reserve resources for the worker.

        Specified by:
        reserveResourcesForWorker in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Parameters:
        workerId - worker id of the worker to start
        totalMem - the amount of memory for the worker or null if not enforced
        cpuNum - the amount of cpu for the worker or null if not enforced
        Throws:
        SecurityException

      • releaseResourcesForWorker

        public void releaseResourcesForWorker(String workerId)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        This function will be called when the worker needs to shutdown. This function should include logic to clean up after a worker is shutdown.

        Specified by:
        releaseResourcesForWorker in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Parameters:
        workerId - worker id to shutdown and clean up after

      • getLaunchCommand

        public List<String> getLaunchCommand(String workerId,
                                     List<String> existingCommand)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        After reserving resources for the worker (i.e. calling reserveResourcesForWorker). This function can be used to get the modified command line to launch the worker with resource isolation

        Specified by:
        getLaunchCommand in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        existingCommand - the current command to run that may need to be modified.
        Returns:
        new commandline with necessary additions to launch worker with resource isolation

      • getLaunchCommandPrefix

        public List<String> getLaunchCommandPrefix(String workerId)
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        After reserving resources for the worker (i.e. calling reserveResourcesForWorker). this function can be used to get the launch command prefix

        Specified by:
        getLaunchCommandPrefix in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Parameters:
        workerId - the of the worker
        Returns:
        the command line prefix for launching a worker with resource isolation

      • getRunningPids

        public Set<Long> getRunningPids(String workerId)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        Get the list of PIDs currently in an isolated container.

        Specified by:
        getRunningPids in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Parameters:
        workerId - the id of the worker to get these for
        Returns:
        the set of PIDs, this will be combined with other ways of getting PIDs. An Empty set if no PIDs are found.
        Throws:
        IOException - on any error

      • getMemoryUsage

        public long getMemoryUsage(String workerId)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ResourceIsolationInterface

        Get the current memory usage of the a given worker.

        Specified by:
        getMemoryUsage in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Parameters:
        workerId - the id of the worker
        Returns:
        the amount of memory the worker is using in bytes or -1 if not supported
        Throws:
        IOException - on any error.

      • getSystemFreeMemoryMb

        public long getSystemFreeMemoryMb()
                           throws IOException
        Specified by:
        getSystemFreeMemoryMb in interface ResourceIsolationInterface
        Returns:
        The amount of memory in bytes that are free on the system. This might not be the entire box, it might be within a parent resource group.
        Throws:
        IOException - on any error.
